caption: Our 'welcome home' was an instrusive and un-American search of our entire bus by the US Forest Service.  The obtuse and childish nature of the event was a bit depressing; the cops themselves didn't seem very proud of where their careers had taken them.

Even though we weren't charged with a crime (and thus don't get a day in court to dispute the actions of these government officials), they left our bus a complete wreck.  It's hard not to get a bit angry looking at these photos.
